body: The general plot is that the mom is married but her husband is overseas. She has two children, one son and one daughter. The son has a friend over. The friend has a bad reputation and rumors about his behavior. He  approaches the mom in private and shows her some legitimately compromising pictures he has of her at which point he tries to talk her into sex but fails at which point h just threatens her with the pictures and she immediately complies. The deal is 1 week of being sex-friends (fuck buddies) in exchange for the pictures.  Later on it is revealed that son's friend is actually the son of the guy that was fucking her and took those pictures in the first place. That guy tossed her away when she got pregnant and now the son is doing the same since it's implied she will get pregnant from that creampie. Also, I don't think the husband knows that the son or daughter isn't his. The chapter ends with the son's friend staying over for a month with them. Still want eng translation pls.
